spec_data.Name: drobo-utils
spec_data.Description:
Drobo-utils is a set of Linux tools to query and manage Data Robotics Drobo
storage systems (Drobos).  This base package provides the command line
utility.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:14:32 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Utilities for managing Drobo storage systems
